name: Hotel Wengener Hof

reviews.text: We stayed here for 4 nights during March for a short ski break. This was the fourth time one or more members of our party had stayed at the Wengener Hof over the past 10 years. Once again we were not disappointed. Rooms are comfortable though not luxurious, south facing have wonderful views, staff are all very efficient and friendly and the food was superb. It is only a short walk from both the station and the cable car, ski's can be left at the sister hotel next to station if you prefer.For some reason we failed when we tried to book through the usual websites, they all came back as "no vacancies". On the off-chance we contacted the hotel direct and was informed that they had rooms available!
reviews.title: Another superb stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here in March - hotel a little out of town but with lovely views. The room was excellent with a huge comfy bed, huge well appointed bathroom and bath. Stayed on a half-board basis and the food was of a high standard. Would definitely stay here again
reviews.title: Well appointed rooms lovely location

likes.liked: — size of room, lovely big bathroom

reviews.text: I have been to the hotel Wengenerhof for 5 successive years. The hotel is in a very quiet position at the end of the village, which is totally car-free.The cost for dinner, bed and breakfast is moderate. The rooms are extremely comfortable, the food is excellent, the ambiance is wonderful and nothing at all is too much trouble to the management and staff.I highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: A Superb Hotel

description: The 4-star hotel Wengener Hof in car-free Wengen is sourrounded by the impressive mountain world of the Bernese Oberland, right at the foot of the Jungfrau. It is one of the most esteemed hotels in a quiet location with extensive gardens for relaxation during the summer months. This traditional hotel is extremely popular with visitors as it offers a consistently high standard of service (4 stars) and because of its excellent location and pleasant scale (65 beds), the Wengener Hof has for many years provided individual hospitality.Wengen is the ideal starting point for various excursions to the Jungfrau region. To the mountain railway station it only takes 5 minutes – from there you start the amazing journey up to the Jungfraujoch – Top of Europe - at 3454 metres altitude which is Europe’s highest railway station and the highlight of every visit to Switzerland! Within 5 minutes walk you reach in summer the tennis courts and in winter the ski school office and its meeting place as well as the beginners’slope and the ice-rink. With the Männlichen cable car which is 5 minutes walk away you reach in just a few minutes the Männlichen mountain which is the perfect starting point for skiing and hiking – with a view of the Eiger, Mönch and Jungfrau.
